英文公告.機關名稱: Taiwan Area National Freeway Bureau, MOTC
英文公告.機關地址: 70 Panshanya, Liming Village, Taishan District, New Taipei City, Taiwan R.O.C.
英文公告.標案名稱: National Freeway Bridge Seismic Retrofitting Project (2nd stage) M32 Bid
英文公告.廠商地址: No.3, Ln. 22, Dingpu Rd., Xiangshan Dist., Hsinchu City 300, Taiwan (R.O.C.)
英文公告.附加說明: Project title: National Freeway Bridge Seismic Retrofitting Project(2nd)stage M32 BidScope of work:Construction Contract consists of 120 main-line, overpass bridges and ramps ranging from the south side of Ankeng stream bridge to the south side of Kuanhsi Interchange (32k+600~79k+250) on the National Freeway No.3 and the Zhonghe Interchange access road viaduct.The major tasks are as follows:Foundation Retrofit, Steel Jacketing, Concrete Jacketing, Pier Caps Retrofit, Abutments Retrofit, Concrete Shear Blocks, Steel Shear keys, Loss Prevention Device, Restrainers Installation and replacement ,and so on.Others:Please check the bid documents.
